FuncDef:
The agetime command sets the aging time of an NQA test.
The undo agetime command restores the default aging time. The agetime command sets the aging time of an NQA test. The undo agetime command restores the default aging time. By default, the aging time of an NQA test is 0, indicating that the test is not aged.

ParaDef.Info:
Specifies the aging time of an NQA test.
The value is in the format of HH:MM:SS. HH specifies an hour that ranges from 0 to 23; MM specifies a minute that ranges from 0 to 59; SS specifies a second that ranges from 0 to 59.

ExtraInfo: To prevent endless running of a test instance, age the test instance periodically. The agetime command can be used to set the aging time to change the survival time of a test instance in the system.
